verses.verse: In my <S%H6869>distress<s%> I <S%H7121>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and he heard <S%H6030>me<s%>.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, from <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%>, and from a <S%H7423>deceitful<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.
What shall be <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3254>you<s%>? or what shall be done unto <S%H7423>you<s%>, you false <S%H3956>tongue<s%>?
<S%H190>Woe<s%> is <S%H1481>me<s%>, that I live in <S%H4902>Mesech<s%>, that I <S%H7931>live<s%> in the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>!
I am for <S%H7965>peace<s%>: but when I <S%H1696>speak<s%>, they are for <S%H4421>war<s%>.
